platforms.name: AssemblyAI

It uniquely targets developers and enterprises with a simple API, fast processing, and a focus on building scalable, real-world AI applications for audio.

Audio Intelligence: Suite of NLP models (Sentiment Analysis, Entity Detection, Topic Detection, Content Moderation, PII Redaction).

platforms.name: Avoma

Its unique value lies in its integrated 'Meeting Lifecycle' approach, combining scheduling, collaboration, note-taking, and analysis in a single workflow, unlike point solutions that only record or transcribe.

Keyword & topic tracking to analyze conversation trends
